name: Raven | Document & Track Designs
description:
Jot down notes for every screen that you design, track and update the progress of your work, sync your work to trello to let your team know what you are upto!


📝Take notes during feedback, critique or things you want to keep in mind.

👨‍💻Update progress of your work and jump quickly to the screens that need your immediate attention.

➰Sync your work to Trello and let your teammates know the progress of your work.



We can't wait for you to try out Raven!


----------------------


💬Have feedback / feature requests / encountered bugs? You can give us your feedback or email us @ interpid16@gmail.com
